result.arabic_text: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّثۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ
result.translation: The man who believed said, “O my people, I fear for you [a fate] like the day of the enemy forces[7],
result.footnotes: [7] i.e., the day of punishment upon those who rejected their prophets in the past.
